name: Welcome to Droid Towers!
description:
To start building your Tower,
tap the Build menu in the bottom right.

name: Breaking ground
description:
Tap on the house icon to open the buy menu.

Then tap "BUY" next to the Lobby.

name: Pillars of Success
description:
Your cursor now is in "Placement" mode.
Double Tap to place the Lobby.

Press the ESCAPE key to exit "Placement" mode.
descriptionMobile:
Your cursor now is in "Placement" mode.
Double Tap to place the Lobby.

Press the BACK button to exit "Placement" mode.

name: There is no place like Home
description:
The Lobby serves as the base for a Tower.

Droids need a place to call home.
You should build an Apartment for them.

name: Beam me up, Scotty
description:
See the red sign on your Apartment?
This means it has no transit connection.

Build an Elevator so the Droids can move in.

name: Sky's the limit!
description:
Elevators need to service
each floor of your Tower.

Connect your elevator by dragging
the top or bottom of the elevator shaft.

name: Pizza, Pizza!
description:
Droids will get hungry over time.

 Luckily they love Pizza!

Build a Pizza Place so they don't starve!

name: Navigation
description:
Now that your Tower is up and running,
lets learn how to control your camera.

To move the screen around,
tap anywhere and drag.

name: Magnification
description:
Great job!

You can also zoom in via your mouse's scroll wheel.
It works just like scrolling a document.

Try it now.
descriptionMobile:
Great job!

You can also zoom the camera
by pinching the screen.

Try it now.

name: Population Overlays
description:
Now that you've mastered the camera controls,
it is time to introduce the data overlays.

In the top right corner tap the Overlays button then,
turn on the Population overlay by tapping the toggle switch.

name: Population Overlays
description:
Look at the Apartment you built,
see the blue coloring?
This shows there are Droids living there.

Overlays provide insight into the management
of your Tower's overall success.

Now turn off the Population overlay.

name: Congratulations!
description:
Congratulations, you are now ready to conquer the sky!

PS: Your Tower will be automatically saved.
